item.title: Microbit
item.description: Cool <section id="main"> <div> <h1 id="title">{{ .Title }}</h1> {{ range .Pages }} {{ .Render "summary"}} {{ end }} </div> </section> when flag clicked clear forever pen down if and then switch costume to [button v] else add (x position) to [list v] end move (foo) steps turn ccw (9) degrees

item.title: Arduino
item.description: Some content n your content files, a shortcode can be called by calling . Shortcode parameters are space delimited, and parameters with internal spaces can be quoted. The first word in the shortcode declaration is always the name of the shortcode. Parameters follow the name. Depending upon how the shortcode is defined, the parameters may be named, positional, or both, although you canâ€™t mix parameter types in a single call. The format for named parameters models that of HTML with the format name="value”.
